00282     class _OgreExport VertexCacheProfiler : public BufferAlloc
00283     {
00284         public:
00285             enum CacheType {
00286                 FIFO, LRU
00287             };
00288 
00289             VertexCacheProfiler(unsigned int cachesize = 16, CacheType cachetype = FIFO )
00290                 : size ( cachesize ), type ( cachetype ), tail (0), buffersize (0), hit (0), miss (0)
00291             {
00292                 cache = OGRE_ALLOC_T(uint32, size, MEMCATEGORY_GEOMETRY);
00293             }
00294 
00295             ~VertexCacheProfiler()
00296             {
00297                 OGRE_FREE(cache, MEMCATEGORY_GEOMETRY);
00298             }
00299 
00300             void profile(const HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr& indexBuffer);
00301             void reset() { hit = 0; miss = 0; tail = 0; buffersize = 0; }
00302             void flush() { tail = 0; buffersize = 0; }
00303 
00304             unsigned int getHits() { return hit; }
00305             unsigned int getMisses() { return miss; }
00306             unsigned int getSize() { return size; }
00307         private:
00308             unsigned int size;
00309             uint32 *cache;
00310             CacheType type;
00311 
00312             unsigned int tail, buffersize;
00313             unsigned int hit, miss;
00314 
00315             bool inCache(unsigned int index);
00316     };
